name: nodemailer-fetch
readme: # nodemailer-fetch Fetches HTTP URL contents for [nodemailer](https://github.com/nodemailer/nodemailer). [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/nodemailer/nodemailer-fetch.svg)](http://travis-ci.org/nodemailer/nodemailer-fetch) ## Usage ```javascript var fetch = require('nodemailer-fetch'); fetch('http://www.google.com/').pipe(process.stdout); ``` The method takes a single argument, the destination URL. Only GET is supported. The defaults are the following: * Basic auth is supported * Up to 5 redirects are followed (Basic auth gets lost after first redirect) * gzip is handled if present * Cookies are supported * No shared HTTP Agent * Invalid SSL certs are allowed ## License **MIT**
